about_the_game:
You’re a young man trying to find out what happened to your father. But in doing so, you ended up having an accident that erased some of your memories. Now, with a clean slate, you moved to another town to start college. In your freshman life, you will meet several girls in a new world filled with fun, mystery, and sex.

After the thrilling events of Season 1, you're finally reunited with your father, and the truth behind his disappearance starts to unveil. However, things aren't as simple as they look.



Planned Features:
  • 200 sex animations in 60 FPS
  • 4 hours of content
  • 11 girls to meet
  • All girls have voices and sexy moans
  • Sexual Content: Creampie, Threesome, Deepthroat, Squirting, Anal Sex and Blowjob

Meet gorgeous women


Romance up to 10 women. Get to know their stories and interests. Build your harem or pick your favorite.

Choose the paths of drama, comedy or lots of sex


Create your own path through your choices. Uncover the mysteries of your past and walk the path of vengeance, or choose to make amends and live a peaceful life.

Get ready for a rollercoaster ride full of adventure, romance, and sex


Deflorate a young virgin girl. Fuck hot MILFs. Have the Threesome of your dreams.

content_descriptors.notes: The game graphically depicts sex, usage of drugs and violence. The story is not intended for players being in a dark period of their lives. If you are easily offended or just looking for a fun game only, this game is not for you.

name: FreshWomen - Season 2
short_description: FreshWomen is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel focusing on the best parts of life. Become a freshman attending Minerva Bay College, romance girls and solve a mysterious incident. Your journey will be filled with comedy, drama, and lots of sex.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
